summary: This mod adds brand new horn and adornment textures for both male and females, they are 100% new textures along with brand new normals.
descriptionHtml:
SSE: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/6104

===========
Description
===========

This mod adds brand new horn and adornment textures for both male and females, they are 100% new textures along with brand new normals. The original vanilla textures where 1024, I have included two options for you.

Please pick one:
Large: 2048x2048
Normal: 1024x1024

====
FAQ
====

Q. Are these HD?
A. I do not consider them or any mod I have done a good enough quality to call them HD. They are however improvements over vanilla imo.

Q. What about the face/body textures are they included?
A. No, they are not. Only the horn/hair textures.

Q. Will this work with <insert mod name here>?
A. Unless that mod changes the horn textures then its 100% compatible.


============
Installation
============
There are two ways to install this mod:

- Use NMM to install the mod for you.
- Download and install the mod manually.

-------------------
Nexus Mod Manager:
-------------------

1. Click the 'Download With Manager' button on top of the file.

2. The mod can then be activated in NMM's mod list when the mod is downloaded fully. Double-click on the mod to start the installation.

3. Install the mod.

4. Finished.

-------------------
Manual Installation:
-------------------

1. Use 7zip to extract the files. Extract the mod to a random place, NOT your Data folder.

2. Place the texture folder into your Data folder found in /Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim/Data

3. Finished.

==============
Uninstallation
==============

-------------------
Nexus Mod Manager:
-------------------

1. Highlight Argonian Improvements SSE - Horns.

2. Select deactivate selected mod.

3. Finished.

-------------------
Manual Installation:
-------------------

1. Delete the textures:

argonianhair.dds
argonianhair_n.dds
argonianfemalehair.dds

2. Finished.

==========
History
==========

1.0 - First Release

====================
Known Bugs & Issues:
====================

There are a couple small seams, some of those are vanilla mesh issues.
